transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji, sir Yashika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, abhi baat hui thi na aap se?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir mai bol rahi thi ki aapne matlab ek request raise ki thi ki like ki aapke sath koi as your team commitment while booking the package sir kya commitment ki gayi thi, bataenge thoda sa?
Customer: Wohi humko leads denge, hum support karenge, local jo aapka banda tha na.
Executive: Sir I agree aur aap bol rahe the ki 15 year se matlab aap to buyleads consume karte the na basically single single buyleads lete the na aap sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To us time jo kaise rehta tha apna feedback sir? Jaise aap single buyleads purchase karte the.
Customer: Woh to mil raha tha na, usse us time to mil raha tha, abhi ye package lene ke baad me aapko mil raha hi nahi hai.
Executive: Us time pe sahi aata tha jab aap single buyleads purchase karte the?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi to phone bhi nahi utha rahe jo local hai na aapka.
Executive: Haan. Jo service sales karke gaya hai usko phone bhi nahi utha rahe abhi.
Executive: Okay, sir ye filter press cloths me deal kar rahe ho abhi?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Ek minute dijiye mujhe aap.
Executive: To dekho aap kahi bhi request raise karenge to woh basically mere paas hi aani hai. Theek hai? Ye cheez hai. Aap kuch bhi karenge mere paas hi aani hai lekin kya hai na abhi actually jitni buyleads available hoti hai sir mai aapko share kar deti hu. Theek hai mai aapko wohi bol raha tha afternoon me bhi. Theek hai jitni available hamare paas hongi aur aapke IndiaMART profile se jitni hongi sir woh mai bhej sakti hu. Theek hai agar buyleads nahi hai sir to abhi understand karte hai ki hum kaha se share karenge sir agar requirement hi nahi hai sir to kaha se bhej sakte hai company ko woh cheez hai sir.
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Aap pehle bhi ab jaise aap pehle bhi buyleads consume karte hoge to aap requirement ke hisab se karte hoge na jab jis client ki requirement aayegi tab aap use consume karenge woh cheez.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Wohi cheez hai abhi buyleads hai hi nahi sir abhi.
Customer: Haan abhi to abhi 15 din hua kuch nahi aa raha hi nahi.
Executive: Mai agree karti hu sir aapko.
Customer: To ye mera issue hai kya mera issue hai ya IndiaMART ka issue hai? Kiska issue hai?
Executive: Nahi aapka issue nahi hai. Bilkul aapka issue nahi hai.
Customer: To ye kiska issue hai madam?
Executive: Mai check kar rahi hu abhi aapke paas. Kyuki dusron ko to aa hi rahega na, dusre apna competitor hai unko to aa hi rahega.
Executive: Kiske paas ja rahi hai sir naam bataiye mujhe.
Customer: Naam mere ko pata nahi lekin mere jo competitor hai unko to aa hi rahega na.
Executive: Haan to competitors wohi to puch rahi hu mai aap se. Competitors bata dijiye mujhe sir aap hamare competitors jo rehte hai Karnataka ki baat kar rahe ho na aap?
Customer: Hum log to pan India hi karte hai na pura.
Executive: Pan India. Ab dekho Karnataka me agar mai check karu aapki jo ye Belgaavi jo location hai na yaha se mai abhi check kar rahi hu ek minute.
Customer: Local to phone hai hi nahi madam local hum log sale bhi nahi karte.
Executive: Nahi nahi local ki mai uski baat nahi karti like jo yaha se deal kar rahe hai matlab jo supplier hai yaha se unki mai bolti hu.
Executive: Presswell filter se aap jante hai aap?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Jaante hai sir?
Customer: Jaante hai.
Executive: Dekho inhone bhi abhi abhi registration karaya hai jyada time nahi hua inko.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Gujarat me to bahut log hai. Unko aa rahi hai.
Executive: Gujarat me?
Executive: Gujarat se kaam ja raha hai?
Customer: Haan Gujarat me to leads player hai kaam bhi kar rahe hai.
Executive: Accha aap mai agar location laga ke na Gujarat ki leads check kar rahi hu.
Customer: Mera location change karo na aap mera location change karo na woh at least woh to change karke dekh lo ek baar.
Executive: Sir dekho ye jo apna plan hai na jo aapne service le rakhi hai basic service hai. Theek hai? Aap understand karna mai kya kehna chah rahi hu hamara jo basic plan hai na sir isme jo cover karta hai basically aapko matlab kuch hi usme visibility rehti hai apni kuch reason jo apne rehte hai unke andar hi apna visibility rehti hai. Theek hai? Ab jo premium services hai na jo next level services hoti hai. Theek hai jaise aapki cities aapki category me agar aap jaante ho unko mai bata deti hu aapko jo use karte hai abhi. Hmm aap agar jaante honge to Isha Engineering company walon ko bhi jaante honge. Theek hai? Aur apna Quick Pharma walon ko bhi jaante honge aapke jo ye filter press hai na uske andar deal karte hai sir woh basically.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To ye TrustSeal services hoti hai basically yaha pe pan India tak visibility hoti hai aap jaise ki dekho ye jo Mumbai ka hai quick pharma.
Customer: Pan India nahi mere ko regional to karke de do isme sirf Maharashtra ka to karke aap kar sakte ho na.
Executive: Pehle aap ye check karo ek baar. Maine aapko bhej diya WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Ek minute dena mujhe mai check karti hu.
Customer: WhatsApp ki hai kya?
Executive: Haan WhatsApp kar rahi hu. Aapke number ke last digit batana mere ko ek baar. Yahi hai na UH profile lagi hui hai aapki. Haan aap check karo. Ye check karo aap. Jaise na niche wale dikh rahe honge aapko Isha Engineering services wala hai. Theek hai? Aapko dikh raha hoga deals in Belgaavi jo aapki location hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai Karnataka ka jo aapka ye pin code lagta hai Belgaavi ka bhi location hai. To deals in Belgaavi Isha Enterprises but ye hai kaha se aap check karo.
Customer: Maharashtra.
Executive: Ye sab to theek hai lekin lekin hamara naam is tarike se visible nahi rehta hai unko kisi bhi agar koi kahi se bhi search karta hai.
Customer: Sir region wise to ho jayega na region wise to ho jayega na.
Executive: Region wise matlab aap bol rahe hai na ye pan India isko ye bataenge hum log Isha Engineering wale ko mere ko kidhar bataenge aap Belgaum me?
Executive: Basically ye aapke jo Belgaum hai na ye city Belgaum ke andar 100 se 150 kilometer ke andar apni visibility dikhaega. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Like aisa hai. Lekin aap socho ki jaise Mumbai ho gaya. Theek hai? Like hamara Mumbai kitna door hai aapke yaha se?
Customer: 500 kilometer hai.
Executive: Haan like Mumbai ho gaya. Theek hai? Ahmedabad ho gaya, Kolhapur ho gaya, Coimbatore ho gaya aur apna aur bhi location like Delhi ho gaya NCR. Theek hai? To yaha pe hum visible kam hai abhi. Visibility ka thoda hai lekin hum buyleads agar available honge to hum buyleads ko consume kar sakte hai but in logo ke paas.
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi kidhar kidhar bata raha hai apna ye location pe?
Executive: Location basically basically mai ye batana chah rahi hu aapko ki visibility hamari all over pan India nahi dikhti hai abhi.
Customer: Okay. Samajh rahe ho aap? Kaun se kaun se region me bata rahi hai?
Executive: Kaun se region me means abhi jaise humne apna ek basic plan le rakha hai na humne sir abhi humne nayi service active kari hai basic services ki. Aap step by step hi to chalenge na sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Woh cheez. Ab dekho ek cheez dekho aap jo aapka ye product hai filter press cloth. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek minute. Aap ye dekho ye leading supplier hai star supplier ye star supplier hai. Isko kahi se bhi koi search karega na humne Noida se maine check kiya hai. Theek hai? Maine aapko share kiya dekho maine Noida se search kiya hai location meri Noida hai lekin mujhe kaha ka dikh raha hai press supplier wala Mumbai ka.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Param filtration wala Param filtration. Theek hai aur uske upar tag bhi laga hua hai star supplier ka aap check karo.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? To inme basically star jo ek product ke liye na ek leading supplier ye deal kar raha hai leading supplier hai ye. Aap check karo ki rating review TrustSeal certificate. Theek hai? Har cheez aapko dikh raha hoga usme. Sabka design catalog website sabhi. Mere ko kya karna padega isme?
Executive: Sir dekho option to hai mere paas but ye ki ab jaise aap usko upgrade kara sakte ho jaha jaha aap jyada deal karte ho basically services me. Like aap aap chahte ho ki mere ko Mumbai Mumbai ka woh chahiye basically deal karna hai to aap usme convert kara sakte ho plan le lenge to plan amount thoda jyada jayega but ye convert kara sakte ho aap waha se aapko na agar lagta hai ki waha se jyada flow hai inquiries ka to aap waha ke liye fir leads aapko aage aage aage.
Customer: Kaha se jyada flow bata raha hai?
Executive: Matlab jaha bhi city me agar aapko lagta hai ki abhi like maan ke chalo mai Delhi se deal kar rahi hu mai Delhi ke supplier hu Delhi se mai matlab supply karti hu aur mujhe lagta hai ki Belgaum se mujhe jyada response mil raha hai. Theek hai? To woh cheez mai bolna chah rahi hu. Particular city wise ya all over pan India ke liye woh cheez aap kar sakte ho. Number of abhi jaise apne paas 90 days ke andar na one call receive hui hai jaha tak maine dekha total 66 inquiries hai hamare paas 66.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to usme number of inquiries bhi hamari increase honge obviously kyuki visibility hamari badhegi na hum ek jagah pe hum itne area me kaam kar rahe hai jab hum area hamara large hoga to obviously hum waha pe bhi jayenge. Woh cheez hai sir visibility ka bhi farak hota hai thoda sa.
Customer: Ab kya package aapka iska?
Executive: Sir dekho agar aap isko TrustSeal me convert karana chahte ho to TrustSeal one year agar aap convert karate ho usko two year me jayega basically ye kyuki hamari one year services already chal rahi thi. To one year agar aap lete hai to 80000 ka padta hai aapko. Do saal ke TrustSeal services usme aapko complimentary certificate bhi dete hai hum aur pan India ki listing milti hai aapko sir. Theek hai certificate matlab TrustSeal ka jo certificate hoga woh TrustSeal stamp hum aapko alag se provide karte hai uske andar.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi to jo mere paas bank account me tha na utna paisa mai daal ke aapko bhejta hu abhi. Matlab? Samjh lo mere paas abhi paisa kuch bhi nahi hai. Jo aapka banda idhar fasa ke gaya hai aapko. Dekho woh aapki mentality hai woh jo bhi hai lekin maine aapko apna ek suggestion diya hai. Theek hai? Aapko isse agar aapke mind me aaye kabhi to aap dekh sakte ho lekin ye hai ki abhi lead actually inke paas to ja raha hai. Theek hai? Kyuki dekho visibility ka farak padta hai aap samajh rahe ho agar aap Belgaum se deal kar rahe ho aapne Delhi me bhi apna poster lagaya hai Lucknow me bhi lagaya hai Uttar Pradesh ke kisi aur state me lagaya to waha se bhi client aapko call karega ruk kar agar aapne kahi apna banner lagaya hai sir. Theek hai lekin agar hum sirf Belgaum ke andar ya Karnataka ke kisi 1000 150 kilometer ke andar rahenge to wahi wahi ka hamare paas customer ka response aayega aur usme bhi hamare paas aur aur jyada matlab hamare competitor rehte hai. To woh cheez rehti hai sir aap shayad understand kar rahe ho is baat ko.
Customer: Nahi ye sab to pehle discuss karna chahiye na aapka sales person.
Executive: Nahi nahi dekho woh unki bhi galti nahi hai actually aate hi agar hum aapko koi heavy service de de na to usme aapko bhi woh rahega ki matlab aate hi mujhe inhone ek badi cheez pakda di to aap abhi aap isme itna matlab hume itna cheeze face karni pad rahi hai. Baki ek baar mai profile ko update karti hu aapke mai kar hi rahi thi uske work aapka lekin udhar ticket raise kara diya na mai kar hi rahi thi uske work. Mai ek baar na aapke ye jo buyleads hai related mai ek baar woh share karti hu aapko aap unhe consume karna aur ek baar mai catalog score ek baar increase karti hu. Mai jo bhi aap se mangu na to WhatsApp pe mujhe ek baar share kar dena theek hai sir?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan aap mujhe WhatsApp jarur karna mai jo bhi aapko bolu. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Local sales person not answering calls.

- Competitors are receiving leads, but not him.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's profile and location.

- Executive explained the limitations of basic plan.

- Executive shared competitor details on WhatsApp.

- Executive offered to upgrade to TrustSeal plan.

- Executive offered to update customer's profile.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share buyleads and increase catalog score.

- Customer will share details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, location, visibility, plan
